metadata.dc:author: Vilacosta, I
Camino, A
Gómez Recio, M
Martínez Elbal, L
Pérez Casar, F
Iturralde, E
San Román, J A
metadata.dc:description: Aneurysm of the mitral valve is a rare complication of infectious endocarditis. We report a 65-years-old woman with left heart failure and mitral regurgitation secondary to a mitral valve aneurysm. The diagnosis was made by transesophageal echocardiography.
metadata.dc:title: Aneurisma de la válvula mitral. Diagnóstico por ecocardiografía transesofágica.
[Mitral valve aneurysm. Its diagnosis by transesophageal echocardiography].
